attributes.action: Remove all Ltns as it is causing to much traffic
attributes.background: Agree to remove them every were

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council, not the UK Government or House of Commons.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
